pullRequest.title: HDDS-3455. Change MiniLoadGenerator to a pluggable model.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
This jira proposes to change MiniOzoneLoadGenerator to a pluggable model, this allows different tests to specify different load generators to be used in the test.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3455
How was this patch tested?
Ran MiniOzoneChaosCluster

nodes.bodyText: If some generator fails to initialize(), should we still consider it in load(long)?  I think it would be more safe to add each generator to a separate list, from which load(long) should choose, only after successful initialization.
Can you please document the required signature for the constructors of LoadGenerator implementations in the interface?

commit.message: HDDS-3455. Change MiniLoadGenerator to a pluggable model.
